content: Vis.C heads to CHI in Hamburg
Charles has received a CHI 2023 honorable mention for “Dirty Data in the Newsroom” (co-authored with Stephen Kasica and Tamara Munzner)
Myrto is going to present in the panel: Academic collaboration as an experiment, 7-9 June 2023, Oslo, Norway.
Derya, Miriah, and Charles have papers accepted to CHI 2023.
